text: Love! Valour! Compassion! is a play by Terrence McNally. The play opened Off- Broadway in 1994 and transferred to Broadway in 1995. It won the Tony Award for Best Play and the Drama Desk Award for Outstanding Play. title: Love! Valour! Compassion!
